name: Weng Santos
text:
If you guys care to know, here's former DILG Sec Alunan and former Pres Ramos explaining the conditions for FM's body's return in the early 90s. Notice that the former agreement even allows for honors, but befitting a major only.
Although the discussion is wrong on one thing: the allowance of FM's burial at LNMB will hinge on whether the extant conditions mentioned in the agreement still exist today.
https://www.facebook.com/jaymeegamil/posts/1238937386118914
